alert.note: Alert for Clark (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued October 22 at 3:48PM PDT until October 22 at 4:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Southeastern Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 445 PM PDT. * At 345 PM PDT, a dust channel was originating from Eldorado Valley, southwest of Boulder City. The dust channel is impacting Highway 95 and Interstate 11. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Detected by Department of Transportation cameras. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. ROADS IMPACTED INCLUDE HIGHWAY 95 AND INTERSTATE 11. Locations impacted include... Boulder City. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
